summary: To ease the burden of federal student loans, borrowers can apply for Income-Driven Repayment plans. The plans use borrowers' taxable income and family size to determine an affordable payment rate. Monthly payments can be as low as $0 and still count toward potential loan forgiveness after the repayment period. title: Federal Student Loans: Education Needs to Verify Borrowers' Information for Income-Driven Repayment Plans
